ovdesc.p: This record holds the user-defined fields which will appear on orders and trades associated with this option type and the routine which is to be run during closeout when the EXOTIC.EVENT flag is set.

desc.p: Name of the user field. The key to a record in DX.USR.FLD.OPT, and will then default in the rest of the USR.FLD. . . fields.
For example, if storing the FX Kick in rate on an option type, this could be called "KI.RATE".
Must be a valid DX.USR.FLD.OPT record.
Up to 35 characters
The user defined prompt for the USR.FLD.VAL field e.g. "FX Kick In Rate".
Defaulted from the DX.USR.FLD.OPT record specified in USR.FLD.NAME.
No Duplicates Allowed
User field length. Defaults from the DX.USR.FLD.OPT record specified in USR.FLD.NAME.
This value in this field should be greater than that held in USR.VAL.MIN
Defaults to the value 35. Any number between 1 and 99.
A short description for this option/record type
Up to 12 characters
Defines if the value of the user defined field is to used as a component of the exotic options price and position keys.
Defaulted from the DX.USR.FLD.OPT record specified in USR.FLD.NAME.
Value can be YES or blank, by default left blank.
User field minimum length. Defaults from the DX.USR.FLD.OPT record specified in USR.FLD.NAME.
This value should be less than the value held in USR.VAL.MAX.
Any number between 1 and 99.
Reserved for future use.
Reserved for future use.
A user defined program or API which is triggered during closeout processing when the EXOTIC.EVENT flag is set on a DX.ORDER or DX.TRADE record associated with this option type.
Must be a valid record on DX.OBJECT.LIBRARY
A description of the purpose of this record/option type
Up to 35 characters
Mandatory
The record key - option type. Can be up to 35 alphanumeric characters.
The exotic options set with EXERCISE are meant as KICKIN events and set to EXPIRE meant as KNOCKOUT events.
Allowed values to this field are EXERCISE, EXPIRE and NULL.
Holds override messages generated when accepting overrides on previous validations of this record.
System generated field (non-inputtable).
